title: Fill in the Blank (1 point per blank, 15 total)
instructions: Type the correct answer(s) in the blank(s). Do NOT use periods to end your answers.

questions.prompt: The most important skill in game development is ___.
What is an example of a software development methodology commonly used in producing games? ___.
___ is an interactive proof of concept that includes as many game mechanics (usually not feature complete) as possible to let players understand what the final game will be like.
___ is a sub-team in development that finds and reports bugs.
Scope, cost, and time make up the ___ triangle of quality.
